evaluate. This means that the preferred usage of the models is to build them once on historical
data and to use them to forecast each step of the walk-forward validation. The models are static
(i.e. not updated) during their evaluation. This is diﬀerent to other models that are faster to
train, where a model may be re-ﬁt or updated each step of the walk-forward validation as new
data is made available. With suﬃcient resources, it is possible to use neural networks this way,
